data.actual_result: The giphy bar haunts me till I start typing a new message
data.expected_result: Giphy bar leaves me alone when I remove the giphy command from the chat box
data.short_description: Giphy bar stays if no results shown once chat box is cleared
data.steps_to_repro: - Search a phrase in chatbox using /giphy that returns no results ("was it this" seems to work) - Ctrl/cmd + A and delete all text in chat box - Observe how giphy bar remains - Click out of chat box (giphy bar hides) - Click back in chat box - Observe how the same giphy bar returns - Type any character in chat box to clear bar
